00040 #ifndef _CameraManager_h
00041 #define _CameraManager_h
00042 
00043 #include "vector3.h"
00044 #include "datatypes.h"
00045 #include "quaternion.h"
00046 
00047 #include <vector>
00048 
00049 namespace Ogre
00050 {
00051     class Camera;
00052     class SceneNode;
00053     class SceneManager;
00054 }
00055 
00056 namespace phys
00057 {
00058     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00059     /// @class CameraManager
00060     /// @headerfile CameraManager.h
00061     /// @brief This is the manager class for all camera functions.
00062     /// @details This class contains all the functionality of the use and manipulation of the camera.
00063     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00064     class CameraManager {
00065         private:
00066             friend class World;
00067             Ogre::SceneManager* SceneManager;
00068             Ogre::Camera* DefaultCamera;
00069             std::vector< Ogre::Camera* > Cameras;
00070             std::vector< Ogre::SceneNode* > Nodes;
00071             unsigned short ONodes;
00072             unsigned short SNodes;
00073             Ogre::Camera* FindCamera(String Name);
00074             Ogre::SceneNode* FindNode(String Name);
00075         public:
00076             CameraManager(Ogre::SceneManager* SManager);
00077             virtual ~CameraManager();
00078             String CreateCamera();
00079             String CreateOrbitingNode(Vector3 Target, Vector3 RelativeLoc);
00080             String CreateStandNode(Vector3 LookAt, Vector3 Location);
00081             void ClearNodes();
00082             void ClearCameras();
00083             void SetLocation(Vector3 Location, String Name="DefaultCamera");
00084             void SetDirection(Vector3 Direction, String Name="DefaultCamera");
00085             void SetOrientation(Quaternion Orientation, String Name="DefaultCamera");
00086             void SetNearClipDistance(Real NearDist, String Name="DefaultCamera");
00087             void SetFarClipDistance(Real FarDist, String Name="DefaultCamera");
00088             void SetAspectRatio(Real Ratio, String Name="DefaultCamera");
00089             void LookAt(Vector3 TargetLoc, String Name="DefaultCamera");
00090             void SetFixedYawAxis(bool UseFixed, Vector3 Axis, String Name="DefaultCamera");
00091             void SetFixedYawAxis(bool UseFixed, String Name="DefaultCamera");
00092             void SetAutoTracking(bool Enabled, String Target, Vector3 Offset, String Name="DefaultCamera");
00093             void SetAutoTracking(bool Enabled, String Target, String Name="DefaultCamera");
00094             String GetNodeAttachedToCamera(String Name="DefaultCamera");
00095             void AttachCameraToNode(String NodeName, String CamName="DefaultCamera");
00096             void DetachCameraFromNode(String NodeName, String CamName="DefaultCamera");
00097             void IncrementYOrbit(Real Radian, String Name);
00098     };
00099 }//phys
